content:
I would like us to fix a few things in the admin page used for managing themes. Here's a list of issues (most of them have PRs that need review btw):

  • https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4410 (adds a checkbox to the Appearance page)
  • https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4459
  • https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4439
  • https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4461
    ...the thing is that all of them are touching on the same files, so I would like us to decide on order these should be worked on and merged if possible.
    ...eventually, I would like us to move to a UI that looks like what I proposed in https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/131#issuecomment-441398733
[WP] Use admin-theme for Log In form · Issue #4410 · backdrop/backdrop-issues

Note: although I'm using the "Appearance" page as an example here, this is not the only place with the issue. As another example, disabled themes can still be used as base themes, and...
[UX][D8] Denote which theme has been set as the admin theme · Issue #4439 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
